name: Undertomb World: Curse of Thaw'Nly ALPHA
name_original: Undertomb World: Curse of Thaw'Nly ALPHA
description:
Play as Pacvir, an adventurer delving into the forbidden tombs of Thaw'Nly in order to retrieve enough magic gold rings to save the Orphan Factory in her village!

WASD to move, E to interact with doors, M for map and Esc for pause.
